0.6.name: wordpress/wpsleep
0.6.description:
wpSleep allows you to create posts in advance have them automatically publish when you'd like. You can then set when different parts of a post are viewable.

Features

  • No database necessary
  • Fast carrying out, as there is only a modicom of code
  • No admin panel required - time specification are directly within the post

Mode of operation

Add the short code [wpsleep] to the desired location in your post.

Examples

  • [wpsleep start="31.12.2010 09:00"]This section is now offline, but from 31.12.2010 9 am for everyone viewable[/wpsleep]
  • [wpsleep start="07.10.2010 09:00" end="08.10.2010" alt="Alt text"]This section is only for a few hours viewable, the rest of the time you see the alternative text[/wpsleep]

Documentation
